data.name: ReadCollection1
data.value: select top(1) max(COLL_DT) from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (ADJ_IND = 'N') and (DIST_MTD = 'A')

data.name: ReadCollection2
data.value: select top(1) min(COLL_DT) from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (ADJ_IND = 'N') and (DIST_MTD = 'A')

data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, PRIM_SEC_CD, ORD_TYP_CD from CKT_OBLIGATION where (CPA_TYPE = 'R') and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OB_ID = @obId) and (DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId)
